About_me: I joined Shell in 2002 and was coming from the boiler maker Babcock Borsig Power Environment (former Steinmueller) were I worked 10 years as mechanical design engineer for Waste Heat Boilers and Process Gas Cooler.  I started my carrier by Shell as design Engineer for Gasifier and Syngas Effluent Cooler for Coal Gasification projects. Later I was further educated in thermohydraulic design by training on the job. Site experience I got in around one year in China for commissioning of the first coal gasification plants, by trouble shooting and inspections. I also was involved in building up spare part manufacturing workshops close to the operating plants.  Currently I work as Hating and Thermal Equipment Engineer for Syngas Effluent cooler in Oil and Gas Gasification. I am married and have 1 child. My hobbies are my family,  boat trips with my sloep and trips by bicycle.
Education: Technical college Dieringhausen/Germany - State Certified Engineer
Name: Doe, Jane 41
Role_Description_1: Thermo hydraulic design of key gasification equipment for Coal, Oil and Gas gasification.
Role_Description_2: Mechanical and thermo hydraulic design of coal gasification equipment; Site support for commisioning, inspections, trouble shooting, manufactrurer qualification.
Role_Description_3: Mechanical design of kay gasification equipment in coal gasification
Role_Description_4: I was responsible for the mechanical detail design of key gasification equipment for coal gasification
Skills: Thermo hydraulic modeling;Heat and Material Balance;CAD Design;Mechanical lay out of key gasification equipment;Workshop inspection;Site inspection;EXCEL VBA
